# Beta users

Allow the datasource be visible to the specified beta users. The default behaviour is datasource being visible to all users if it is enabled and not visible to any user if it is not enabled.


## Code Samples

### Python (API Client)

```python
from glean.api_client import Glean
import os


with Glean(
    api_token=os.getenv("GLEAN_API_TOKEN", ""),
    instance=os.getenv("GLEAN_INSTANCE", ""),
) as glean:

    glean.indexing.permissions.authorize_beta_users(datasource="<value>", emails=[
        "Neil92@gmail.com",
        "Alejandrin_Boyer4@hotmail.com",
        "Shyanne_McLaughlin95@hotmail.com",
    ])

    # Use the SDK ...
```

### Typescript (API Client)

```typescript
import { Glean } from "@gleanwork/api-client";

const glean = new Glean({
  apiToken: process.env["GLEAN_API_TOKEN"] ?? "",
  instance: process.env["GLEAN_INSTANCE"] ?? "",
});

async function run() {
  await glean.indexing.permissions.authorizeBetaUsers({
    datasource: "<value>",
    emails: [
      "Neil92@gmail.com",
      "Alejandrin_Boyer4@hotmail.com",
      "Shyanne_McLaughlin95@hotmail.com",
    ],
  });


}

run();
```

### Java (API Client)

```java
package hello.world;

import java.lang.Exception;
import java.util.List;
import org.openapis.openapi.Glean;
import org.openapis.openapi.models.components.GreenlistUsersRequest;
import org.openapis.openapi.models.operations.PostApiIndexV1BetausersResponse;

public class Application {

    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {

        Glean sdk = Glean.builder()
                .apiToken("<YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN_HERE>")
                .instance("<YOUR_GLEAN_INSTANCE_HERE>")
            .build();

        GreenlistUsersRequest req = GreenlistUsersRequest.builder()
                .datasource("<value>")
                .emails(List.of(
                    "Neil92@gmail.com",
                    "Alejandrin_Boyer4@hotmail.com",
                    "Shyanne_McLaughlin95@hotmail.com"))
                .build();

        PostApiIndexV1BetausersResponse res = sdk.indexing().permissions().authorizeBetaUsers()
                .request(req)
                .call();

        // handle response
    }
}
```

### Go (API Client)

```go
package main

import(
	"context"
	"os"
	apiclientgo "github.com/gleanwork/api-client-go"
	"github.com/gleanwork/api-client-go/models/components"
	"log"
)

func main() {
    ctx := context.Background()

    s := apiclientgo.New(
        apiclientgo.WithSecurity(os.Getenv("GLEAN_API_TOKEN")),
        apiclientgo.WithInstance(os.Getenv("GLEAN_INSTANCE")),
    )

    res, err := s.Indexing.Permissions.AuthorizeBetaUsers(ctx, components.GreenlistUsersRequest{
        Datasource: "<value>",
        Emails: []string{
            "Neil92@gmail.com",
            "Alejandrin_Boyer4@hotmail.com",
            "Shyanne_McLaughlin95@hotmail.com",
        },
    })
    if err != nil {
        log.Fatal(err)
    }
    if res != nil {
        // handle response
    }
}
```
